This 1938 James Stewart film won Best Picture & earned an Oscar for its director, Frank Capra
clues.answer: You Can't Take It with You

clues.text: (Sarah serves up our next story.)  At the 17th Street Bake-Off today, the big winner was a pie made from these stalks...mmmm!
